title: Citroen bags order for 500 e-C3 units from Refex Green Mobility
description: French automaker Citroen secured an order for 500 e-C3 electric vehicles from Refex Green Mobility in New Delhi. An MoU was signed, highlighting sustainability and emission cuts. Citroen’s Shishir Mishra and Refex’s Yash Jain emphasize the e-C3, with an ARAI-certified range of 320 kilometers, supporting India’s carbon-neutral goals.
